job.title: Software Engineer, Growth
job.description: stronguAbout NinjabrbrustrongAt Ninja we are building deliveryonly convenience stores that deliver in 10 minutes or less Its a service that feels like magic We are a rapidly growing startup building an exceptional team Come be a part of our early journey in becoming a household name in last mile delivery across North America and the worldbrbrWe are venturebacked by the same investors of iconic companies like DoorDashbrbrstronguOverviewbrbrustrongAs one of the first members of the Engineering team you will need to be a generalist that can contribute at every part of the stack not only in engineering but across the whole company You need to be a productfocused engineer that is highly analytical and can pull insights from our data to shape our productbrbrYour responsibilitiesbrulliSetup AB tests to improve different funnels for increased retention order growth and increased basket sizesliliCome up with hypotheses on our user behaviours and write code to pull insights out of our data to answer these hypothesesliliWork with our customer facing engineering teams to come up with new features and strategies to reduce our CAC and increase LTVbrliulstronguRequirementsbrustrongulliYou have experience working on growth at a high growth startupliliStrong SQL skillsliliYou have strong software engineering fundamentals with a passion for high quality codeliliYou understand how to make tradeoffs that lead to the biggest business impact with the limited time that you havebrliulustrongBenefitsbrstronguulliWork directly with the founder to shape the direction of our service and productliliSteep learning curve and career growth trajectory Were growing at breakneck speeds and we want a team that grows with usliliAn opportunity to help build a potentially iconic company in its early daysliliEquity in a fast growing early stage startupliul
